textPosts.text: In everydays life I design and code user interfaces for websites and web apps. I have tried my hand in marketing and event management as well.
helps me build and design cool web things. I have also used Bootstrap, WordPress and jQuery.
Collaboration and communication. I have launched Google Developer Group in my city and I organize tech events.

textPosts.quote: “It is going to be a cool quote”

textPosts.text: Collaboration and communication. I have launched Google Developer Group in my city and I organize tech events.

projects.title: Offline first todo app
projects.text: a progressive (offline first) web app for creating and managing shopping lists or any other todo lists, built with Create React App.

projects.title: Frontend web developer at design agency Norrskog
projects.text: Developed responsive web pages. Worked on UI design, as well as graphic design.

projects.title: Tezaurs dictionary
projects.text: Frontend developed for Latvian language dictionary Tezaurs

projects.title: Creative industries’ meetup Heyday
projects.text: My first website for social creative industries' project Heyday, co-founded by me.

projects.title: Marketing consulting company Inextra web page
projects.text: UI design and frontend development with WordPress CMS integration for a website of marketing solution company Inextra.

projects.title: Frontend developer at software company Stream Labs
projects.text: Worked on a customer support page's frontend using React. Collaborated on a UI/UX design.
